main event: A civilian in Gregory, Texas reported seeing a multi-colored, round object resembling a kite in the sky for over 2.5 hours on August 4, 1965.
interesting points: The object appeared to be spinning and changing colors at times.
The object remained stationary and appeared to climb at times, but also moved in a southward course from Gregory, Texas.
The observer used binoculars to view the object, which was estimated to be between 3,200 and 4,200 feet in altitude.
A weather balloon was launched from Corpus Christi Naval Air Station around 5 PM on the day of the sighting, which may have been what the observer saw.
The observer was a deputy sheriff who was considered a reliable witness.
sighted object: a multi-colored, round object resembling a kite
